    • Method Detail

      • getColumns

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<T,?>> getColumns()
        Description copied from interface: TableProvider
        This method returns an ObservableList containing the different TableColumn instances for this provider.
        This method should return immediately, even when the provider has not created all TableColumn instances yet -- other instances can be added later to the ObservableList by the provider.
        It is important to note that the instances of TableColumn are responsible for returning the correct column data.
        Specified by:
        getColumns in interface TableProvider
        Returns:
        an ObservableList containing the TableColumns for this provider.

      • setColumnNames

        public void setColumnNames(String... columns)
        Description copied from interface: TableProvider
        Define which columns should be created by this TableProvider. The matching between the column names and the TableColumns that will be returned by getColumns is protocol-dependent.
        Specified by:
        setColumnNames in interface TableProvider

      • buildColumns

        protected void buildColumns()
